cause.description:
Now I'm not saying that by stoping animal abuse you have to stop eating meat. But across the world every single day poor helpless animals are being beaten to a bloodly pluse by reckless owners...You can help stop this by supporting this cause.
1. Animals are being beaten, hunted, torchered and killed everyday for no good reason.
cause.mission: To help people understand that animal abuse is wrong, they are living breathing things just like ourselves!
cause.name: Stop Animal Abuse!
